title: Bots in co-op vs ai
body:
Complaint:

When playing co-op vs ai I have come across many games where I have bots on my team. This includes the whole team consisting of bots.
These bots just go into lane with the recommended items and feed the enemy. 

Please look into this Riot. It's becoming impossible to enjoy the game when this happens.
Cheers

replies.body:
Hey there,

Please report these accounts in the end-game screen under "Cheating" be as detailed as possible in your report message.
